title: JSW Renew Energy signs major 700 MW solar power agreement with NTPC
description: JSW Renew Energy Thirteen Limited signs a 700 MW solar Power Purchase Agreement with NTPC Limited, aiming to enhance India's renewable energy capacity. The project will connect via ISTS and STU networks, with a tariff of Rs2.59/kWh for 25 years, expected to be completed by June 2026.
